UPF - FORGe.from sentence: We compare to the best submissions in the WebNLG challenge : Melbourne , an end - to - end system that scored best on all categories in the automatic evaluation , and UPF - FORGe , a classic grammar - based NLG system that scored best in the human evaluation .

end - to - end neural baseline.from sentence:
Additionally , we developed an end - to - end neural baseline which outperforms the WebNLG neural systems .
It uses a set encoder , an LSTM decoder with attention , a copy - attention mechanism and a neural checklist model , as well as applying entity dropout .
